SEARCH
Package org.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
org.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
GameController manages the game logic, including piece placement, movement, and tracking player turns.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    GameController(SaveState saveState, GameClient lightPlayer, GameClient darkPlayer, Initializer initializer)
    Constructs a GameController with a saved game state, players, and initializer.

    Constructs a GameController with the specified map model, players, and initializer.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(@NotNull MapModel mapModel, GameClient player1, GameClient player2, Initializer initializer)
      Constructs a GameController with the specified map model, players, and initializer.
      Parameters:
      mapModel - the map model representing the game board
      player1 - the first game client (player)
      player2 - the second game client (player)
      initializer - the initializer to return to the menu after the game ends

    • GameController

      public GameController(SaveState saveState, GameClient lightPlayer, GameClient darkPlayer, Initializer initializer)
      Constructs a GameController with a saved game state, players, and initializer.
      Parameters:
      saveState - the saved state of the game
      lightPlayer - the game client for the light player
      darkPlayer - the game client for the dark player
      initializer - the initializer to return to the menu after the game ends

  • Method Details

    • receiveInput

      public void receiveInput(int field)
      Receives input from the current player and processes it based on the current game phase. Depending on whether the game is in the mill phase, placing phase, or moving phase, the input is handled accordingly to update the game state.
      Parameters:
      field - the position on the board where the player wants to place or move a piece

    • exitGame

      public void exitGame(PlayerColor playerColor)
      Handles the exit of a player from the game. Logs the exit event, ends the game for both players, and returns to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      playerColor - the color of the player who exited

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame()
      Saves the current game state using the initializer's save functionality. Constructs a SaveState object with the current board configuration, player pieces, game phase, and other relevant information before passing it to the initializer.
